title: Bloodmoon Bundles well all bundles really
body:
As the title says there needs to be a bundle just for the 4 new skins i already own the champs and don't want to buy them again. I also don't care to much about the icons tho if they were included i would most likely still get it. Any ideas @Riot.

This was originally posted else where but i was told to post it here.
Thanks Please Help.

replies.body:
They take off the champion prices in the bundles if you already own the champions.....




{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
if you have the champs you dont pay for them only for the skins.
Bundles were updates years ago to become FLEXIBLE. If you own a piece of content that is within said bundle the price is reduced.

i dont see a price difference my friend who doesn't own the champions and me see the same price and on top of that that means riot want 2000 rp for a siver skin that is not that significant i guess what i really want then is to see the original price and then all the deductions for my own peace of mind
